game_description: - This is the individual/student version of VRflow - VRflow B737NG is the interactive cockpit procedure trainer for pilots. Train procedures in training scenarios that incorporate detailed aircraft behavior including sounds, instruments and cockpit layout. VRflow incorporates numerous features for efficient learning and aircraft familiarization, ideal for type ratings. Train with or without visual help, track your errors, see your training time, train with an automatic crewmember and much more. 14 normal procedures and 3 emergency/abonormal procedures are included with dynamic checklists, step by step explanations and task sharing with the automatic crew member. VRflow also contains Explore Mode, where you can explore the cockpit and learn about systems. The individual/student version does not include multi-crew functionality.
review_1: Very well designed and helpful for initial type class, i very enjoyed the app Wish had more procedures but still good to have something to practice
review_2: Having previously used their A320 sim extensively, this B737 sim is just as good as their prior offering. All normal procedures and five emergency procedures are represented here. Buttons can be toggled, majority of the displays are simulated, and step-by-step instructions are available for the whole process. In addition, the sim offers an Explore Mode where you can read more info about specific buttons and switches. The developer has stated that the sim will continue to receive updates so this will be a good training investment. If you wanna try it out before purchasing, check out the demos for this and the A320 sim also listed on App Lab. This sim isn't a replacement for a full featured sim like MSFS2020 or X-Plane, but it's a nice companion that offers portability of not needing a full gaming PC and the ability to train anywhere, even while on travel.
